author: dblevins
msg: Tweaked the tool so it defaults to Static3DES and lists the available ciphers.  Also doesn't "pretty" up the output and just prints the encrypted value.  Makes it easier on command-line junkies like myself who like to pipe and script stuff (saves me from having to strip off the junk i don't care about).

author: adeneche
msg: MAHOUT-138 - transformed Watchmaker examples to CLI style command line
